notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the AGER CARIPLO Italian foundation, grant number 2017–2022, project “ProSuIT-Tecnologia (T) a favore (Pro) della suinicoltura italiana (Su-I)”, and by AGER-Agroalimentare e ricerca: Advanced research in genomics and processing technologies for the Italian heavy pig production-Hepiget project, grant number 2011-0279.
